column4: I have an off-topic question: I've just created a very simple PAM module ... and I've packaged it up as a tarball and in RPM form.  (The tarball contains a working .spec file .. which I've tested)
Once ... many eons ago ... I "debiatized" some package ... just to teach myself how.
The question: where would be the best place for me to ask for a little coaching on how to package this PAM module for Debian/Ubuntu as well?
for packaging, you might want to try #ubuntu-motu
